magpie.cluster

Class WekaClusterer

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.cluster.BaseClusterer
      • magpie.cluster.WekaClusterer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Commandable, Options, Printable

    public class WekaClusterer
extends BaseClusterer
    Use Weka to cluster data.

    Usage: <method> [<options...>]
    method: Method used to cluster data. Name of a Weka Clusterer ("?" for available methods)
    options...: Options for the clusterer

    See Also:
